signupContent.title: FR-Get an instant quote and buy Insurance

form.checkbox1Label: FR-I understand the above and acknowledge that I will answer all questions to the best of my ability at the time of completing this application.
form.checkbox2Label: FR-I understand and agree that the personal information collected through this purchasing process will be shared with the Insurance Broker, Insurance Underwriters, in the event of a claim Third Party Claims Adjusters, and other companies or individuals required to service your insurance requirements and needs. Additionally, I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy contained in your portal.

errors.passwordMinCharacters: FR-Password must be a minimum of 8 characters
errors.passwordUppercaseCharacters: FR-Password must contain at least 1 uppercase alphabet
errors.passwordLowerCharacters: FR-Password must contain at least 1 lowercase alphabet
errors.passwordNumericCharacters: FR-Password must contain at least 1 numeric character
